title: SQL Server 监控视图 - New

query.q: M::`sqlserver_database_io`:(fill(avg(`write_bytes`), linear) AS `平均写入数据大小`) { `sqlserver_host` = '#{hostname}' and `database_name` != 'tempdb' and `file_type` = 'LOG' } BY `database_name`, `file_type`, `sqlserver_host`, `logical_filename`, `physical_filename`

M::`sqlserver_database_io`:(fill(avg(`writes`), linear) AS `平均写入数量`) { `sqlserver_host` = '#{hostname}' and `database_name` != 'tempdb' and `file_type` = 'LOG' } BY `database_name`, `file_type`, `sqlserver_host`, `logical_filename`, `physical_filename`

M::`sqlserver_database_io`:(fill(avg(`read_bytes`), linear) AS `平均读取数据大小`) { `sqlserver_host` = '#{hostname}' and `database_name` != 'tempdb' and `file_type` = 'LOG' } BY `database_name`, `file_type`, `sqlserver_host`, `logical_filename`, `physical_filename`

M::`sqlserver_database_io`:(fill(avg(`reads`), linear) AS `平均读取数量`) { `sqlserver_host` = '#{hostname}' and `database_name` != 'tempdb' and `file_type` = 'LOG' } BY `database_name`, `file_type`, `sqlserver_host`, `logical_filename`, `physical_filename`

M::`sqlserver_database_io`:(fill(avg(`write_bytes`), linear) AS `平均写入数据大小`) { `sqlserver_host` = '#{hostname}' and `database_name` != 'tempdb' and `file_type` = 'ROWS' } BY `database_name`, `file_type`, `sqlserver_host`, `logical_filename`, `physical_filename`

M::`sqlserver_database_io`:(fill(avg(`writes`), linear) AS `平均写入数量`) { `sqlserver_host` = '#{hostname}' and `database_name` != 'tempdb' and `file_type` = 'ROWS' } BY `database_name`, `file_type`, `sqlserver_host`, `logical_filename`, `physical_filename`

M::`sqlserver_database_io`:(fill(avg(`read_bytes`), linear) AS `平均读取数据大小`) { `sqlserver_host` = '#{hostname}' and `database_name` != 'tempdb' and `file_type` = 'ROWS' } BY `database_name`, `file_type`, `sqlserver_host`, `logical_filename`, `physical_filename`

M::`sqlserver_database_io`:(fill(avg(`reads`), linear) AS `平均读取数量`) { `sqlserver_host` = '#{hostname}' and `database_name` != 'tempdb' and `file_type` = 'ROWS' } BY `database_name`, `file_type`, `sqlserver_host`, `logical_filename`, `physical_filename`
M::`sqlserver_performance`:(non_negative_derivative(`sql_compilations`) AS `每秒 SQL 编译数`) { `sqlserver_host` = '#{hostname}' } BY `sqlserver_host`

charts.name: 每秒 SQL 重新编译数

query.q: M::`sqlserver_performance`:(non_negative_derivative(`sql_re_compilations`) AS `每秒 SQL 重新编译数`) { `sqlserver_host` = '#{hostname}' } BY `sqlserver_host`
query.alias: 每秒 SQL 重新编译数

units.key: 内存管理器可使用的内存
units.name: 内存管理器可使用的内存

query.q: M::`sqlserver`:(last(`committed_memory`) AS `已提交的内存`) { `sqlserver_host` = '#{hostname}' } BY `sqlserver_host`
M::`sqlserver`:(last(`target_memory`) AS `内存管理器可使用的内存`) { `sqlserver_host` = '#{hostname}' } BY `sqlserver_host`
query.alias: 内存管理器可使用的内存
